sections.heading: Overview
sections.content: The school offers a convenient and efficient bus service, designed to make every student’s daily commute safe, comfortable, and stress-free. The transport system reflects RSJMS’s commitment to punctuality, safety, and care.

sections.heading: School Bus Service
sections.content:
With designated routes and scheduled pick-up and drop-off points, the RSJMS transport department ensures that students arrive at school and return home comfortably and on time. Bus routes are clearly planned to minimise travel time and ensure the safety of each child. 

The service is available for students from Kindergarten to P5 on specific routes. Each bus is accompanied by trained staff members to oversee the journey and assist children as needed.

For detailed route information, the school provides updated bus route lists through the administrative office and parent communication channels.
